price: 103. Waxaa arrinkani ugu sugan calaamad ciddii ka cabsan Cadaabka Aakhirada, kani waa Maalin dadka la soo kulmin iyagoo dhan, waana Maalin goob joog la ahaan.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّمَنۡ خَافَ عَذَابَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمٞ مَّجۡمُوعٞ لَّهُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمٞ مَّشۡهُودٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan liman khāfa ʿadhāba al-ākhirati dhālika yawmun majmūʿun lahu al-nāsu wadhālika yawmun mashhūdun
